doc.title: Detective Mullet and the Case of the Golden Hair Pick
doc.plot: Detective Mullet has been chosen to solve the murder of Greg Malone, a big time Production company mogul. Mullet suspects Mohawk, a famous rock star who coincidentally is dating is sister Angel. Mullet begins to learn that Mohawk and is sister have broken up and she was the last person to see Malone. All of the pieces begin to point in Angel's direction. Mullet must decide how thick blood is.
